member.name: T:MyPycSQLtranslator.PycSQLtranslator
member.summary: Represents a C# class for translating queries from a custom Cyrillic-based SQL-like interpreted-like language to English.

member.name: T:MyPycSQLtranslator.PycSQLtranslator.Token
member.summary: Represents a token with its word and type.

member.name: P:MyPycSQLtranslator.PycSQLtranslator.Token.Word
member.summary: The word contained in the token.

member.name: F:MyPycSQLtranslator.PycSQLtranslator.PycSQldictionary
member.summary: Dictionary for mapping Cyrillic keywords to their English equivalents.

member.name: M:MyPycSQLtranslator.PycSQLtranslator.Translate(System.String)
member.summary: Translates the input query from the custom Cyrillic-based language to English.

member.name: M:MyPycSQLtranslator.PycSQLtranslator.Cyrillic(System.Char)
member.summary: Determines if a character is Cyrillic.

member.name: M:MyPycSQLtranslator.PycSQLtranslator.Tokenize(System.String)
member.summary: Tokenizes the input query into individual words based on the presence of Cyrillic characters.

member.name: M:MyPycSQLtranslator.PycSQLtranslator.Dictionarize(System.Collections.Generic.List{MyPycSQLtranslator.PycSQLtranslator.Token}@)
member.summary: Applies translation logic based on the token types and performs the query translation.
